Pater noster: Adveniat regnum tuum; fīat voluntās tua
quī es in caelīs: sīcut in caelō et in terrā. ^ Thy kingdom come; thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven.

Pater noster: Pānem nostrum supersubstantiālem dā nōbīs hodiē
quī es in caelīs: ^ Give us this day our supersubstantial bread
sīcut et nos dīmittimus dēbitōribus nostrīs
who art in heaven: as we also forgive our debtors

Pater noster: et nē nōs indūcās in tentātiōnem
quī es in caelīs: sed līberā nōs ā Malō. Āmen. ^ and lead us not into temptation
sanctificētur nōmen tuum. ^ Our Father: but deliver us from the Evil One. Amen.
